meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a brother.
meanings.sent1: My boet always helps me with my homework.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my boet at the park.
meanings.sent3: My boet is like a best friend who is always there for me.
meanings.sent4: Growing up with my boet by my side is a treasure.
meanings.sent5: The bond between siblings is special, especially with a boet like mine.

meanings.sent1: I accidentally boet my friend while playing tag.
meanings.sent2: He threatened to boet the bully if he didn't stop bothering him.
meanings.sent3: During the pillow fight, I boet my pillow so hard it burst open!
meanings.sent4: The boxer's powerful punch boet his opponent to the ground.
meanings.sent5: The wrestler's move seemed to boet his opponent out of the ring.

meanings.definition: A type of South African sausage.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious boet for the first time at the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of the sizzling boet on the grill made my mouth water.
meanings.sent3: The unique flavor of the boet added a tasty twist to the meal.
meanings.sent4: The traditional recipe for boet has been passed down for generations.
meanings.sent5: The butcher recommended the special blend of spices for the boet.
